analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 16.75. Sanidassanattika, Upādāduka🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādā dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: sa ni das sana ttikaḥ upa ād āduka  anidassana appaṭigham upādā dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ no upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  anidassana sappaṭigham no upādā dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na no upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha  anidassana appaṭigham no upādā dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na no upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha
translated: The Chapter on the Conditions🔽The Section on the Triad and Duad

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ noupādā ca anidassanaappaṭighaṁ noupādā ca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham no upādā ca anidassana appaṭigham no upādā ca dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na no upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha
